name: Agent 404: Evidence not Found
description:
Agent 404, one of the best agents in your town, tries to solve one of the crime scene that happened in a huge house. Your goal is to investigate all these evidences and show it to the court.

However, you are also the criminal and your goal is to remove all the real evidences to prove that the crime you have commited IS NOT REAL.

How to Play:

Use WASD in your keyboard to play the game.

Use F to interact with the objects

Use Esc to Open the Menu bar.

The game is available in both browser and Windows. (Got no time to place it in mobile unfortunately)

Background:

This game is solo developed  but, some of the assets used are from other developers placed in the Credit Scene. Some of the assets are slightly tweaked to match the theme of the game. 

Expected Play Time is less than 10 minutes :) 

I hope you enjoy the game! Don't forget to add some feedback and ratings as well :D
